fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can convert once.
- Conversion is simply a goal change, making your convert win with you.
- If you attempt to convert a non-convertable target, you will instead deal an Unstoppable attack.
- Unconvertable players include...
Factional evils (Mafia, Coven, Vampires)
Roles that can become factional evils (Amnesiac, Apprentice, etc.)
- If you attempt to convert another Cultist or another Cultist's convert, you will fail but not kill them.
- This will use your conversion charge.
- If you fail your conversion, you can gain another charge by staying home for two nights.
- After you have used your conversion charge, you can attack every night.
- If you die, your convert will become a Cultist without a conversion charge and with a Powerful attack.
- Your convert turned Cultist cannot have their charge refilled.
- Your convert is treated as an non-convertable role to other, non-Cultist conversion roles.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - Roles like Guardian Angel, upon conversion, will have you as their target.
